lead_paragraph: This summer, the Berlin Biennale isn't the only art show in town. Kreuzberg, long one of Berlin's creative districts, is hosting the first-ever Kreuzberg Biennale, through August. Though it's on a smaller scale than the city-wide event, it's got plenty of edgy offerings -- and in some unlikely places.
snippet: Though it's on a smaller scale than the Berlin Biennale, the first-ever Kreuzberg Biennale has got plenty of edgy offerings -- and in some unlikely places.

headline.main: In Berlin, Finding Art in Unlikely Places

abstract: Though it's on a smaller scale than the Berlin Biennale, the first-ever Kreuzberg Biennale has got plenty of edgy offerings -- and in some unlikely places.
